snippet: Video posted online by Syrian activists appeared to show a crackdown on student protesters in the city of Aleppo, the country's most important commercial center.
abstract: Video posted online by Syrian activists appeared to show a crackdown on student protesters in the city of Aleppo, the country's most important commercial center.

headline.main: Syrian Activists Report Crackdown on Student Protests in Major City
